newsitem.title: USA: Argosy Gaming applies for Iowa license.
newsitem.headline: Argosy Gaming applies for Iowa license.

text.p: Argosy Gaming Co said Thursday it has applied for a gaming license for a proposed site in Osceola, Iowa.
The project would include about 1,100 gaming positions with an estimated cost of $60 million, the riverboat casino company said.

A hearing on the license is expected in March and a decision on whether the license is granted usually comes a month after, Argosy said. The gaming site would be ready for operations when and if the license is granted, the company said.
Argosy shares were up 3/8 at 5 Thursday.
